name: Ylopo
tagline: AI-first lead generation with voice and text nurturing assistants
description: Ylopo is an AI-first lead generation and nurturing platform featuring AI-powered texting and voice assistants. When a new lead is generated, their AI voice assistant calls on your behalf using a nearly human-indistinguishable voice. Also offers AI-powered video ads that automatically create high-converting Meta ads from MLS listing data.
cons: Requires Meta ad spend on top
